snippet: Bubba Watson had not even planned to play in the Hero World Challenge in Nassau, Bahamas. He left no doubt Sunday who was going to win.
abstract: Bubba Watson wins Hero World Challenge golf tournament in Nassau, Bahamas; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson had not even planned to play in the Hero World Challenge in Nassau, Bahamas. He left no doubt Sunday who was going to win.
